info.name: Pulper
info.description:
The Pulper is an application to support practicing:

- Testing
- API usage
- API Automating
- GUI Automating

It can be accessed at:

- https://thepulper.herokuapp.com

With downloads and more detail at:

- https://eviltester.com/thepulper

The source code is available on Github at:

- https://github.com/eviltester/TestingApp/tree/master/java/testingapps/thepulper

And is part of The Evil Tester's Compendium of Testing Apps

- https://github.com/eviltester/TestingApp


The API uses a custom header for authentication:

`X-API-AUTH`

The value of this is shown in the admin menu of your GUI session:

- https://thepulper.herokuapp.com/apps/pulp/gui/menu/admin

request.description: Check if the application is running

originalRequest.description: Check if the application is running

request.description:
Create a session for the value in the `X-API-AUTH` header if it does not exist already, useful for using the API on its own.

If you want to then use the GUI for the API session, just amend the JSESSIONID in the browser to the cookie value in the api responses.

This API call does not require authentication, but is 'unofficial'. No such API call would exist in a 'real' application.

originalRequest.description:
Create a session for the value in the `X-API-AUTH` header if it does not exist already, useful for using the API on its own.

This API call does not require authentication, but is 'unofficial'. No such API call would exist in a 'real' application.
